00056 template <class T>
00057 class SeCurve
00058 {
00059     mutable int cacheCV;
00060 public:
00062     enum InterpType { kNone=0, kLinear, kSmooth, kSpline, kMonotoneSpline };
00063     struct CV{
00064         CV(double pos,const T& val,InterpType type)
00065             :_pos(pos),_val(val),_interp(type)
00066         {}
00067 
00068         double _pos;
00069         T _val,_deriv;
00070         InterpType _interp;
00071     };
00072 private:
00073     std::vector<CV> _cvData;
00074     bool prepared;
00075 public:
00076     SeCurve();
00077 
00079     void addPoint(double position,const T& val,InterpType type);
00080 
00082     void preparePoints();
00083 
00085     T getValue(const double param) const;
00086 
00089     double getChannelValue(const double param,int channel) const;
00090 
00093     CV getLowerBoundCV(const double param) const;
00094 
00096     static bool interpTypeValid(InterpType interp);
00097 
00099     static bool cvLessThan(const CV &cv1, const CV &cv2);
00100 private:
00102     void clampCurveSegment(const T& delta,T& d1,T& d2);
00103 
00105     static double comp(const T& val,const int i);
00106 };
00107 
00108 }
